name: Mivaldi Grey
description:
Cut to a narrow fit, OpalSky's Mivaldi pants feature bold asymmetrical design with smart yet casual dual material styling, making it the perfect addition to any wardrobe.
Women's sizes currently out of stock.
description_cn:
欧珀空服装的米瓦尔迪裤子裁剪得很窄,十分大胆的不对称设计,巧妙而休闲的双材料风格,使它成为任何衣橱的完美补充.
女款目前缺货.
